basic.Peptide Name:
adevonin (Derived from Adenanthera pavonina trypsin inhibitor (ApTI))
inhibitor (ApTI))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.30570384]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 80958 (MIC=7.35 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli ATCC 35218 (MIC=7.35 μM), Klebsiella oxytoca ATCC 13182 (MIC=1.84 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 70603 (MIC=3.67 μM), Serratia marcesens ATCC 13880 (MIC=1.84 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae KpC+ 001825971 (MIC=25.6 μM)
